name: Shakr Media Company Ltd.
description: Provider of a video making platform designed to connect businesses of all sizes with success in the video first world. The company's platform offers over 2,000 video designs made by professional video designers and proprietary video editing & rendering technology to promote video ads on Facebook and Instagram, enabling anyone to make visually stunning and ROI generating video ads in minutes.
one_liner: Provider of a video making platform designed to connect businesses of all sizes with success in the video first world. The company's platform offers over 2,000 video designs made by professional video designers and proprietary video editing & rendering technology to promote video ads on Facebook and Instagram, enabling anyone to make visually stunning and ROI generating video ads in minutes.
